verbs.description: [V: indicted] prigozhin ordered beatings killing a security aide to yevgeny prigozhin a russian businessman who has been indicted by american investigators for allegedly trying to interfere with the 2016 u s election says the mogul has been involved in attacks on several people and at least one killing an independent russian newspaper reported monday prigozhin has been dubbed putin chef for organizing catering events for russian president vladimir putin and even personally serving him and his guests on some occasions valery amelchenko amelchenko reporter u s bashar assad moscow valery alemchenko president xi jinping bashar al assad vladimir putin prigozhin president elena khusyaynova xi jinping syrian government novaya gazeta russian soviet federative socialist republic denis korotkov oleg simonov syria yevgeny prigozhin russia
